meanings.definition: Having qualities traditionally associated with women.
meanings.sent1: She is the womanliest person I know, always caring and nurturing.
meanings.sent2: The dress she wore to the party was the womanliest outfit in the room.
meanings.sent3: Her cooking skills are womanliest when she bakes delicious pies.
meanings.sent4: The garden she tended to was the womanliest, blooming with colorful flowers.
meanings.sent5: The womanliest trait she possessed was her ability to listen and empathize with others.

meanings.definition: In a manner characteristic of a woman.
meanings.sent1: She walked womanliest, with grace and elegance.
meanings.sent2: She spoke womanliest, choosing her words carefully and softly.
meanings.sent3: She danced womanliest at the party, twirling and swaying with finesse.
meanings.sent4: She sang womanliest, hitting high notes with a melodious voice.
meanings.sent5: She laughed womanliest, with a gentle and infectious giggle.

meanings.sent1: She was known as the womanliest in the village, admired by all for her kindness.
meanings.sent2: Her actions spoke of the womanliest, always putting others before herself.
meanings.sent3: In the play, she played the womanliest character, portraying strength and compassion.
meanings.sent4: The painting depicted the womanliest figure, exuding beauty and grace.
meanings.sent5: Her presence in the room was the womanliest, commanding attention with her poise.
